entry.title: Monday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow or rain beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with rain changing to rain near midnight and ending overnight then cloudy. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
